Package de.unisb.cs.st.javaslicer.common.classRepresentation

Interface Instruction

All Superinterfaces:
Comparable<Instruction>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractInstruction, ArrayInstruction, FieldInstruction, IIncInstruction, IntPush, JumpInstruction, LabelMarker, LdcInstruction, LookupSwitchInstruction, MethodInvocationInstruction, MultiANewArrayInstruction, NewArrayInstruction, SimpleInstruction, TableSwitchInstruction, TypeInstruction, VarInstruction
public interface Instruction
extends Comparable<Instruction>
Interface for all instructions that are stored in a ReadMethod.
Author:
Clemens Hammacher

    • getType

      InstructionType getType()

    • getPrevious

      Instruction getPrevious()
      Returns the (statically) preceeding instruction, which might be null if this instruction is the first one of the method. The index of the previous instruction is the index of this one minus one.
      Returns:
      the previous instruction

    • getNext

      Instruction getNext()
      Returns the (statically) next instruction, which might be null if this instruction is the last one of the method. The index of the next instruction is the index of this one plus one.
      Returns:
      the next instruction
